product_name: Keen Kona Flip Sandals - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're hanging out in the park on a sunny day or enjoying beachside fun, the Keen Kona Flip Sandals will give you the classic Keen fit, support and comfort all in flip-flop form. Washable polyester webbing straps are comfortable next to skin. Compression-molded EVA midsoles offer shock absorption and padding for all-day wear. Nonmarking, lightweight rubber outsoles offer flexibility and dependable traction on the boardwalk and the beach. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're hanging out in the park on a sunny day or enjoying beachside fun, the Keen Kona Flip Sandals will give you the classic Keen fit, support and comfort all in flip-flop form.
